mapper.select: select * from review order by reviewID desc
mapper.insert: insert into review (user_id, movieID, content, rating, write_date) values (#{user_id}, #{movieID}, #{content}, #{rating}, now())
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content}, rating=#{rating} where reviewID=#{reviewID}
mapper.select: select * from review where movieID=#{movieID} order by reviewID desc limit #{start}, #{perPage}
select count(*) from review where movieID=#{movieID}

select sum(rating) from review where movieID=#{movieID}
